job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: 100 Remote Franklin TNMinneapolis MN preferredltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for midlevel engineers who will be working for the Commercial Data Engineering Team The team works with payment integrity and implementing new clients This person will be tasked with loading client data into the client systems after it has been transformed and enriched by another internal application called DataPoint This team is the bridge between DataPoint and the client downstream systems The application sends data to a prepay system and maps transforms and distributes thisltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltbrgt Undergraduate degree or equivalent work experienceltbrgt A year of practical experience of developing solutions hosting within key major cloud providers such as OpenShift Kubernetes AWS GCP and Azureltbrgt 4 years in the software engineering profession with demonstrated success designing and building highquality commercial software applicationsltbrgt 2 years working with data loading strategiesltbrgt 2 years of development experience using Java or opensource technologiesltbrgt 2 years developing Restful APIsltbrgt 2 years working with CICDltbrgt Expert in SQL technologies across different platforms ie Oracle MSSQL MySQL etcltbrgt ltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtMust Havesltstronggtltbrgt NodeJS and APIsltbrgt JavaJavaScriptltbrgt SQL or PLSQLltbrgt Familiarity with CICD Jenkinsltbrgt GitHubltbrgt ltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtPlussesltstronggtltbrgt Experience with DockerKubernetesltbrgt Experience with the Cloud Azure specificallyltbrgtltbrgt Someone with an opensource mindsetltbrgtltbrgtRestful APIsCICDNodeJS SQL PLSQLJenkinsGitHubDockerKubernetesCloud data loading strategiesJavaJavaScriptAgileSAFEOracleMS SQLMySQL
